text.tspan: Annual working hours vs. GDP per capita
Working hours are the annual average per worker. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in the
Annual working hours per worker (hours per worker)
Data source: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021)
